subproject.corporate outcome: 1) Capacities of African governance institutions, networks and think-tanks strengthened; 2) Knowledge of governance identified, codified and shared; 3) Democratic governance assessment tools (APRM) developed and/or modified.
subproject.description: The project will assist with building capacity for the implementation of the APRM through providing technical and financial support to the Panel and secretariat; provide support to APRM countries in undertaking preparations for APRM, to operational activities of the APR Panel and Secretariat including background studies, country visits as well as to advocacy and awareness building for APRM.
subproject.title: RAF/04/004 - APRM - RSC

title: Assistance to the African Peer Review Mechanism
